alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 2:46PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Beaverhead County through 315 PM MDT... At 245 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of Monida, or 29 miles northwest of Idmon, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph, pea size hail, and brief heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Roads will likely become slick, possibly with some ponding of water. Locations impacted include... Monida. This includes Interstate 15 between mile markers 1 and 5 . MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
